project-subtitle: Brief one-line description of the project
overview-p1: Describe what the project is and what problem it solves. Explain the context and motivation behind building this project.
overview-p2: Add more details about the project scope, objectives, and what makes it interesting or valuable.

challenges-p1: Describe the main technical challenges you faced during development.
challenges-p2: Explain how you overcame these challenges and what solutions you implemented.
learnings-p1: Describe the key technical skills or concepts you learned or improved while working on this project.
